definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)

sentences.english: Football is played in all weathers, including rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 可以在氣候下玩橄欖球，包括雨天和雪天。

sentences.english: Our famous football team have put our town on the map.
sentences.chinese: 我們著名的橄欖球隊使我們鎮出了名。

sentences.english: It's a mix between football, basketball and hockey with trampolines thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 有包括橄欖球，籃球以及曲棍球，利用蹦牀彈跳發球。

sentences.english: They called off the football match because of a severe thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 因爲暴雨太大了，他們把橄欖球賽取消了。

sentences.english: OS: Can you change weather before a match like in Madden?
sentences.chinese: 可以像麥登橄欖球一樣在比賽前改變天氣嗎？

sentences.english: ”Thorpe said,“How could anyone get hurt playing football?”
sentences.chinese: 索普回答說，“打橄欖球怎麼會受傷呢？”

sentences.english: But there seems something wrong in the rugby this year.
sentences.chinese: 但是今年的橄欖球賽好象有點不對勁。

sentences.english: College football is the coolest thing on the planet.
sentences.chinese: 大學橄欖球賽是整個星球上最酷的事情。

sentences.english: She holds up an old football and tosses it towards me.
sentences.chinese: 她舉起一箇舊橄欖球朝我扔來。

sentences.english: His audience consists predominantly of groups of rugby-club revellers.
sentences.chinese: 他的觀衆主要是橄欖球俱樂部裏那些縱酒作樂的人。

sentences.english: Alabama is now college football's number-one-ranked team.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉巴馬大學現在成爲了大學橄欖球聯賽的領頭羊。
該大學貶低校際橄欖球賽的重要性。

sentences.english: Black and yellow are the colors of the city's football team, the Pittsburgh Steelers.
sentences.chinese: 黑色和黃色是城市的橄欖球隊，匹茲堡鋼人隊的顏色。

sentences.english: and I know there's a barbecue. I think there's probably a football game,
sentences.chinese: 我還知道有燒烤會。我覺得也許還有橄欖球賽，

sentences.english: The team won the last two world rugby sevens competitions.
sentences.chinese: 這支隊伍得了上兩屆七人制橄欖球世界錦標賽的冠軍。

definition: supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
